wines.name: Auxerrois
wines.description: Auxerrois wine is a white wine produced from the Auxerrois grape variety. It is crisp, fresh, and has delicate flavors of peach, apricot, and white flowers. It is commonly found in the Alsace region of France.

wines.name: Chenin avec chêne
wines.description: Chenin avec chêne is a white wine that is fermented and aged in oak barrels. It is characterized by its complex flavors of oak, vanilla, and stone fruit, and has a smooth and creamy texture.

wines.name: Chenin Blanc
wines.description: Chenin avec chêne is a white wine that is fermented and aged in oak barrels. It is characterized by its complex flavors of oak, vanilla, and stone fruit, and has a smooth and creamy texture.

wines.name: Chenin Blanc
wines.description: Chenin avec chêne is a white wine that is fermented and aged in oak barrels. It is characterized by its complex flavors of oak, vanilla, and stone fruit, and has a smooth and creamy texture.

wines.name: Cincuenta
wines.description: Vitorino Eguren refers to the years of love and youth with «Cuarenta» (40), his «Cincuenta» (50) celebrates his working anniversary and «Ochenta» (80) his eightieth birthday. All wines are unfiltered, «Ochenta» comes from a single location with old vineyards

wines.name: Crasto Red
wines.description: Vitorino Eguren refers to the years of love and youth with «Cuarenta» (40), his «Cincuenta» (50) celebrates his working anniversary and «Ochenta» (80) his eightieth birthday. All wines are unfiltered, «Ochenta» comes from a single location with old vineyards

wines.name: Crasto Superior Red
wines.description: Very complex notes of dark berried fruits, gum cistus and cocoa lingering towards the elegant finish.Excellent length. Crasto Superior Red is fresh and balanced on the nose. Fresh on the palate, great body and ripe firm tannins.

wines.name: Flor de Crasto
wines.description: Flor de Crasto is a red wine from Portugal's Douro Valley. It offers rich and intense flavors of black fruits, with notes of spice and vanilla, and a smooth, velvety texture.

wines.name: Garnacha
wines.description: Garnacha, also known as Grenache, is a red wine varietal that originated in Spain. It typically has bold and fruit-forward flavors of red and black berries, with notes of spice and a smooth, medium-bodied texture.

wines.name: Graciano
wines.description: Graciano is a red wine grape varietal that is primarily grown in Spain. It typically produces wines with rich and complex flavors of dark fruit, earthy tones, and a hint of spice, with firm tannins and a full-bodied texture.

wines.name: Malavasia
wines.description: Malvasia is a white wine grape varietal that is grown in many regions around the world. It typically produces wines with aromatic floral notes, flavors of ripe tropical fruit, and a slightly sweet finish.

wines.name: Martin Sendoya
wines.description: Flor de Crasto is a red wine from Portugal's Douro Valley. It offers rich and intense flavors of black fruits, with notes of spice and vanilla, and a smooth, velvety texture.

wines.name: Nerofino
wines.description: Nerofino is a bold and full-bodied red wine with rich flavors of dark fruit, hints of spice and oak, and a velvety texture. Perfect with hearty dishes.

wines.name: Ochenta
wines.description: Vitorino Eguren refers to the years of love and youth with «Cuarenta» (40), his «Cincuenta» (50) celebrates his working anniversary and «Ochenta» (80) his eightieth birthday. All wines are unfiltered, «Ochenta» comes from a single location with old vineyards

wines.name: Portugieser
wines.description: Portugieser is a red wine with origins in Portugal, but now widely grown in countries such as Austria, Germany, and Hungary. It is known for its light to medium-bodied texture and fruity flavors, often with notes of cherries, raspberries, and spices.

wines.name: Quinta do Crasto LBV (Port)
wines.description: Quinta do Crasto LBV is a rich and full-bodied red wine with complex aromas of ripe berries and subtle hints of spice. It boasts a deep ruby color and a velvety texture, with smooth tannins and a long, elegant finish

wines.name: Crasto Reserva Old Vines
wines.description: Quinta do Crasto Reserva Old Vines is a premium wine crafted from carefully selected grapes harvested from old vines. This full-bodied red wine boasts rich aromas of dark fruits and spices, with a complex flavor profile that balances fruitiness and oakiness.

wines.name: Crasto Touriga Nacional
wines.description: Quinta do Crasto Touriga Nacional is a fine red wine made exclusively from Touriga Nacional grapes. With a deep ruby color and intense aromas of black fruits and floral notes, this wine is rich, velvety, and full-bodied on the palate.

wines.name: Crasto Vinha Maria Teresa
wines.description: Quinta do Crasto Touriga Nacional is a fine red wine made exclusively from Touriga Nacional grapes. With a deep ruby color and intense aromas of black fruits and floral notes, this wine is rich, velvety, and full-bodied on the palate.

wines.name: Ripasso Classico
wines.description: Ripasso Classico is a rich and complex Italian wine with a deep ruby color and intense aromas of dark cherry, blackcurrant, and vanilla. On the palate, it reveals a full-bodied and velvety texture, with flavors of ripe plum, chocolate, and spice.

wines.name: Samtrot S
wines.description: Samtrot S is a bright and elegant German red wine with a vibrant ruby color and delicate aromas of red berries, cherries, and a hint of spice. On the palate, it offers a refreshing acidity, balanced tannins, and a silky texture, with flavors of strawberry, raspberry, and a touch of pepper

wines.name: Silvaner
wines.description: Samtrot S is a bright and elegant German red wine with a vibrant ruby color and delicate aromas of red berries, cherries, and a hint of spice. On the palate, it offers a refreshing acidity, balanced tannins, and a silky texture, with flavors of strawberry, raspberry, and a touch of pepper.

wines.name: Мaturana
wines.description: Maturana S is a bold and complex red wine from the Rioja region of Spain. It boasts a deep garnet color and intense aromas of blackberry, plum, and tobacco. On the palate, it reveals a full-bodied and velvety texture, with flavors of dark fruit, chocolate, and a hint of vanilla.

wines.name: Amarone Classico
wines.description: Amarone Classico is a luxurious Italian wine with a deep ruby color and complex aromas of dark fruit, chocolate, and vanilla. On the palate, it boasts a full-bodied and velvety texture, with rich flavors of black cherry, fig, and tobacco.

wines.name: Bandol
wines.description: Bandol is a robust and aromatic French red wine from the Provence region, known for its distinctive deep ruby color and intense aromas of blackcurrant, cherry, and herbs de Provence. On the palate, it boasts a full-bodied and silky texture, with flavors of blackberry, plum, and a hint of spice.

wines.name: Bandol rose
wines.description: Bandol Rosé is a refreshing and aromatic French wine from the Provence region, known for its delicate pink color and aromas of red fruit, citrus, and wildflowers. On the palate, it offers a crisp acidity, balanced by a subtle sweetness and flavors of strawberry, watermelon, and a hint of herbs.

wines.name: Brunello di Montalcino
wines.description: Brunello di Montalcino is an elegant and refined Italian red wine with a garnet color and complex aromas of black cherry, leather, and spice. On the palate, it reveals a full-bodied and velvety texture, with flavors of ripe plum, tobacco, and a touch of vanilla.

wines.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
wines.description: Cabernet Sauvignon is a rich and bold red wine with a deep garnet color and aromas of blackcurrant, blackberry, and cedar.

wines.name: Chateau de Terrefort
wines.description: On the palate, it offers a full-bodied and firm texture, with flavors of dark fruit, chocolate, and a hint of tobacco. This wine is made from Cabernet Sauvignon grapes, grown in various regions around the world, and aged in oak barrels for added complexity

wines.name: Chateau Haut-Carles
wines.description: Chateau Haut-Carles is an exceptional Bordeaux red wine with a deep ruby color and complex aromas of blackberry, plum, and vanilla. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied and rich texture, with flavors of dark fruit, chocolate, and a hint of spice.

wines.name: Chateau La Clemence
wines.description: This wine is made from a blend of Merlot and Cabernet Franc grapes, grown in the esteemed Saint-Emilion appellation of Bordeaux, France. It is aged in oak barrels for at least 12 months, resulting in a wine of exceptional depth and character.

wines.name: Chateau Rolan de By
wines.description: Chateau Rolan de By is an elegant and complex Bordeaux red wine with a deep ruby color and aromas of blackcurrant, blackberry, and leather. On the palate, it boasts a full-bodied and silky texture, with flavors of dark fruit, chocolate, and a hint of spice.

wines.name: Chatheau de Chambert
wines.description: This wine is made from a blend of Malbec, Merlot, and Tannat grapes, grown in the limestone-rich soils of the Cahors appellation in Southwest France. It is aged in oak barrels for at least 12 months, resulting in a wine of exceptional depth and character.

wines.name: Côteaux d’Aix Provence
wines.description: Côteaux d'Aix en Provence is a classic French rosé wine with a pale pink color and delicate aromas of wild strawberry, peach, and citrus.

wines.name: Côtes du Roussillon
wines.description: Côtes du Roussillon Villages is a robust and flavorful red wine with a deep ruby color and intense aromas of blackberry, black cherry, and herbs de Provence.

wines.name: Eguren Ugatre Crianza
wines.description: Eguren Ugarte Crianza is a premium Spanish red wine with a deep cherry color and intense aromas of black cherry, vanilla, and toasted oak.

wines.name: Famille Perrin
wines.description: Famille Perrin is a prestigious French winery known for producing high-quality wines with exceptional depth and character

wines.name: Faugeres
wines.description: Faugeres is an exceptional French red wine with a deep garnet color and aromas of dark berries, herbs, and spice. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied and rich texture, with flavors of blackberry, black cherry, and a hint of licorice

wines.name: Frans Malan Cape Blend
wines.description: Frans Malan Cape Blend is a premium South African red wine with a deep ruby color and complex aromas of blackberry, cherry, and tobacco

wines.name: Grenache
wines.description: Grenache is a bold and flavorful red wine with a ruby-red color and aromas of red cherry, raspberry, and black pepper. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied and velvety texture

wines.name: Languedoc Rose
wines.description: Languedoc Rosé is a delightful French wine with a bright pink color and aromas of strawberry, raspberry, and a touch of citrus.

wines.name: Languedoc Rouge
wines.description: Languedoc Rouge is a robust and flavorful red wine with a deep garnet color and aromas of black cherry, blackcurrant, and earthy spices. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied

wines.name: Merlot
wines.description: Merlot is a smooth and approachable red wine with a ruby color and aromas of black cherry, plum, and vanilla. On the palate, it offers a medium-bodied and velvety texture

wines.name: Negroamaro
wines.description: Negroamaro is a bold and rustic Italian red wine with a deep ruby color and aromas of black cherry, plum, and tobacco. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied and velvety texture

wines.name: Passiari
wines.description: It is a perfect pairing for fresh seafood, grilled vegetables, or a summer salad. Enjoy chilled on a warm day or as an aperitif with friends.

wines.name: Pinot Noir
wines.description: "Revelation" Pinot Noir is a luxurious red wine with a bright ruby color and captivating aromas of red cherry, raspberry, and vanilla. On the palate, it boasts a silky and velvety texture

wines.name: Pinotage
wines.description: Pinotage is a unique South African red wine with a deep ruby color and distinctive aromas of dark fruit, smoke, and earthy notes. On the palate, it offers a medium-bodied texture

wines.name: Portigieser Weissherbst
wines.description: Pinotage is a unique South African red wine with a deep ruby color and distinctive aromas of dark fruit, smoke, and earthy notes. On the palate, it offers a medium-bodied texture

wines.name: Porto (Tawny 20 years)
wines.description: Porto Tawny 20 Years is a luscious and complex fortified wine with a deep amber color and aromas of dried fruit, nuts, and caramel.

wines.name: Primitivo
wines.description: Primitivo is a rich and full-bodied red wine with a deep ruby color and aromas of black cherry, blackberry, and spice. On the palate, it offers a velvety texture

wines.name: Primitivo
wines.description: Redhill Pinotage is a South African red wine with a deep ruby color and complex aromas of black cherry, raspberry, and tobacco. On the palate, it boasts a full-bodied and smooth texture

wines.name: Rosso Riserva
wines.description: Rosso Riserva is a premium Italian red wine with a deep ruby color and complex aromas of ripe black cherry, tobacco, and spices. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied and velvety texture

wines.name: Syrah
wines.description: Syrah is a bold and complex red wine with a deep purple color and intense aromas of blackberry, black pepper, and tobacco. On the palate, it boasts a full-bodied and velvety texture, with flavors of dark fruit, chocolate, and a hint of spice.

wines.name: Tempranillo
wines.description: Tempranillo is a classic Spanish red wine with a deep ruby color and aromas of red fruit, leather, and tobacco. On the palate, it offers a medium to full-bodied texture, with flavors of cherry, plum, and vanilla.

wines.name: Vina Real Gran Reserva
wines.description: Vina Real Gran Reserva is a premium Spanish red wine with a deep ruby color and complex aromas of dark fruit, leather, and vanilla. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied and velvety texture, with flavors of blackberry, plum, and a hint of spice.

wines.name: Teroldego
wines.description: Teroldego is an Italian red wine with a deep ruby color and intense aromas of black cherry, plum, and spice. On the palate, it boasts a full-bodied and velvety texture, with flavors of dark fruit

wines.name: Bianco di Custoza
wines.description: Bianco di Custoza is a fresh and lively Italian white wine with a pale straw color and aromas of white peach, citrus, and herbs. On the palate, it offers a light and crisp texture, with flavors of green apple, lemon, and a hint of minerality

wines.name: Viognier
wines.description: Viognier is a luscious and aromatic white wine with a pale gold color and fragrant aromas of apricot, peach, and white flowers. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied and velvety texture

wines.name: Gewuerztraminer
wines.description: Gewürztraminer is an aromatic white wine with a pale yellow color and a distinctive bouquet of lychee, rose petals, and tropical fruit. On the palate, it offers a full-bodied and rich texture, with flavors of ripe peach, apricot, and a hint of spice

wines.name: Grillo
wines.description: Grillo is a fresh and crisp white wine with a straw-yellow color and aromas of citrus, peach, and tropical fruit.

wines.name: Dalila
wines.description: Dalila is a delightful and refreshing white wine with a light straw color and aromas of green apple, pear, and citrus. On the palate, it offers a crisp and lively texture

wines.name: Moscato Giallo
wines.description: Moscato Giallo is a delightful Italian white wine with a bright golden color and aromatic notes of peach, apricot, and honey. On the palate, it offers a light and refreshing texture

wines.name: Pinot Grigio
wines.description: Pinot Grigio is a light and crisp white wine with a pale straw color and aromas of green apple, pear, and citrus. On the palate, it offers a refreshing and lively texture, with flavors of lemon, grapefruit

wines.name: Rivaner
wines.description: Rivaner is a crisp and refreshing white wine with a light straw color and aromas of green apple, lemon, and white peach. On the palate, it offers a lively and zesty texture

wines.name: Riesling «Imperial»
wines.description: Riesling "Imperial" is a premium German white wine with a bright golden color and complex aromas of apricot, peach, and honey. On the palate, it offers a vibrant and zesty texture, with flavors of green apple, citrus, and a hint of minerality

wines.name: Rotari Cuvee 28+ Brut
wines.description: Rotari Cuvee 28+ Brut is a premium Italian sparkling wine with a pale straw color and elegant aromas of green apple, white peach, and fresh bread. On the palate, it offers a crisp and refreshing texture, with flavors of citrus, pear, and a hint of almond

wines.name: Sauvignon Blanc
wines.description: Sauvignon Blanc is a crisp and refreshing white wine with a pale yellow color and aromas of grapefruit, green apple, and freshly cut grass. On the palate, it offers a zesty and lively texture, with flavors of citrus, tropical fruit, and a hint of minerality

wines.name: Hekate Passito
wines.description: Hekate Passito is a luxurious natural sweet dessert wine with a deep golden color and rich aromas of honey, apricot, and candied citrus. On the palate, it offers a luscious and velvety texture, with flavors of ripe stone fruit, caramel

wines.name: Chardonnay
wines.description: Chardonnay is a popular white wine with a bright golden color and aromas of tropical fruit, vanilla, and oak. On the palate, it offers a medium to full-bodied texture, with flavors of apple, pear, and a hint of buttery richness
